Package com.tagtraum.macos.systemevents

Interface AppearancePreferencesObject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Reference

    @Code("apro")
@Name("appearance preferences object")
public interface AppearancePreferencesObject
extends Reference
    A collection of appearance preferences.
    Author:
    JaplScript 3.4.8
